name: Cursor naming convention - prefix control
description:
List of schema cursors that  have name not started with <%PARAM%>
The prefix value is a parameter that can be changed at will
output:
This report lists all Cursor names not starting with the specific prefix.

It provides the following information:

- Cursor name, 
-Cursor full name
rationale:
For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected

=> Names of Cursors defined as global in a Package should start with <%PARAM%>
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention
total: total is number of cursor defined into the schema
